author: Pete LePage
title: New in Chrome 81
description: New in Chrome 81 Chrome 81 is starting to roll out to stable now. Here's what you need to know: I've got an update on the adjusted Chrome release schedule. App Icon Badging graduates from its origin trial. Hit testing for augmented reality is now available in…
content:
Chrome 81 is starting to roll out to stable now.
Here's what you need to know:
Im Pete LePage, working and shooting from home,
lets dive in and see whats new for developers in Chrome 81!
Note: We've created a set of resources to help you
ensure your site… [+5953 chars]
